Interface for Gym User Operations
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      boolean registerUser(User user)
      Registers a new user
      Parameters:
      user - the user details
      Returns:
      true if registration is successful

    • login

      User login(String email, String password)
      Authenticates a user
      Parameters:
      email - user email
      password - user password
      Returns:
      the user details if authentication is successful, null otherwise

    • logout

      void logout(int userId)
      Logs out a user
      Parameters:
      userId - user ID

    • getUserById

      User getUserById(int userId)
      Gets user by ID
      Parameters:
      userId - user ID
      Returns:
      the user details

    • getUserByEmail

      User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Gets user by email
      Parameters:
      email - user email
      Returns:
      the user details

    • updateUserProfile

      boolean updateUserProfile(User user)
      Updates user profile
      Parameters:
      user - updated user details
      Returns:
      true if update is successful

    • deleteUser

      boolean deleteUser(int userId)
      Deletes a user
      Parameters:
      userId - user ID
      Returns:
      true if deletion is successful

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(int userId, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes user password
      Parameters:
      userId - user ID
      oldPassword - current password
      newPassword - new password
      Returns:
      true if password change is successful

    • resetPassword

      boolean resetPassword(String email)
      Resets user password
      Parameters:
      email - user email
      Returns:
      true if reset is successful

    • getAllUsers

      List<User> getAllUsers()
      Gets all registered users
      Returns:
      list of all users

    • getUsersByRole

      List<User> getUsersByRole(int roleId)
      Gets users by their role
      Parameters:
      roleId - role ID
      Returns:
      list of users with the specified role

    • activateUser

      boolean activateUser(int userId)
      Activates a user account
      Parameters:
      userId - user ID
      Returns:
      true if activation is successful

    • deactivateUser

      boolean deactivateUser(int userId)
      Deactivates a user account
      Parameters:
      userId - user ID
      Returns:
      true if deactivation is successful
